Summary: A one inch (size in the sky) cylindrical shaped object with a red light amidship came from the west and made a slow silent turn to the south. It came back north, turned to the west and dissapeared. No sound.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Metairie
There were no other sightings in Metairie on or around May 15th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsA one inch (size in the sky) cylindrical shaped object with a red light amidship came from the west and made a slow silent turn to the south. It came back north, turned to the west and disappeared. No sound. The west to southwest turn was smooth and then the flight south appeared erratic. I had no idea of what it could be. I was in my back yard patio as I do when my Yorkie has to go outside. I always hoped to see something in the sky since I observed a slow west to east object blueish in color back in 1951.
